name: Puchipuchi 「プチプチ」
description:
"Puchipuchi" is a party game I am making on the side while finishing my bachelor in game design. I hope you'll enjoy it!

Controls:

Player 1:

- WASD to move (Gamepad 4)

- Left shift to shove/dash (Gamepad "A")

Player 2:

- WASD to move (Gamepad 3)

- Left shift to shove/dash (Gamepad "A")

Player 3:

- WASD to move (Gamepad 2)

- Left shift to shove/dash (Gamepad "A")

Player 4:

- WASD to move (Gamepad 1)

- Left shift to shove/dash (Gamepad "A")

Music:

Ujico - Hop Skip Jump

Ujico - Sunday

Eleline - Koto no Town

TEMPURA KIDZ & Moe Shopタピタピ

(I do not claim ownership of these songs, they are only placeholders)
